jpo.Camera

Methods in jpo with parameters of type Camera
 void SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode.copyAddPictures(java.io.File sourceDir, java.io.File targetDir, java.lang.String groupName, Camera cam)
          Copies the pictures from the source tree to the target directory and adds them to the collection only if they have not been seen by the camera before.
protected static void SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode.copyAddPictures1(java.io.File[] files, java.io.File targetDir, SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode receivingNode, ProgressGui progGui, Camera cam)
          Copies the pictures from the source tree to the target directory and adds them to the collection.
